seg-source.mrk: An exhibit of Markdown

target.mrk: An exhibit of Markdown

trans-unit.source: This note demonstrates some of what [Markdown][1] is capable of doing.

seg-source.mrk: This note demonstrates some of what [Markdown][1] is capable of doing.

target.mrk: This note demonstrates some of what [Markdown][1] is capable of doing.

trans-unit.source: *Note: Feel free to play with this page. Unlike regular notes, this doesn't automatically save itself.*

seg-source.mrk: *Note: Feel free to play with this page.
Unlike regular notes, this doesn't automatically save itself.*

target.mrk: *Note: Feel free to play with this page.
Unlike regular notes, this doesn't automatically save itself.*

seg-source.mrk: Basic formatting

target.mrk: Basic formatting

trans-unit.source: Paragraphs can be written like so. A paragraph is the basic block of Markdown. A paragraph is what text will turn into when there is no reason it should become anything else.

seg-source.mrk: Paragraphs can be written like so.
A paragraph is the basic block of Markdown.
A paragraph is what text will turn into when there is no reason it should become anything else.

target.mrk: Paragraphs can be written like so.
A paragraph is the basic block of Markdown.
A paragraph is what text will turn into when there is no reason it should become anything else.

trans-unit.source: Paragraphs must be separated by a blank line. Basic formatting of *italics* and **bold** is supported. This *can be **nested** like* so.

seg-source.mrk: Paragraphs must be separated by a blank line.
Basic formatting of *italics* and **bold** is supported.
This *can be **nested** like* so.

target.mrk: Paragraphs must be separated by a blank line.
Basic formatting of *italics* and **bold** is supported.
This *can be **nested** like* so.

seg-source.mrk: Paragraph modifiers

target.mrk: Paragraph modifiers

seg-source.mrk: Code block

target.mrk: Code block

trans-unit.source: Code blocks are very useful for developers and other people who look at code or other things that are written in plain text. As you can see, it uses a fixed-width font.

seg-source.mrk: Code blocks are very useful for developers and other people who look at code or other things that are written in plain text.
As you can see, it uses a fixed-width font.

target.mrk: Code blocks are very useful for developers and other people who look at code or other things that are written in plain text.
As you can see, it uses a fixed-width font.

trans-unit.source: You can also make `inline code` to add code into other things.

seg-source.mrk: You can also make `inline code` to add code into other things.

target.mrk: You can also make `inline code` to add code into other things.

seg-source.mrk: Quote

target.mrk: Quote

trans-unit.source: Here is a quote. What this is should be self explanatory. Quotes are automatically indented when they are used.

seg-source.mrk: Here is a quote.
What this is should be self explanatory.
Quotes are automatically indented when they are used.

target.mrk: Here is a quote.
What this is should be self explanatory.
Quotes are automatically indented when they are used.

seg-source.mrk: Headings

target.mrk: Headings

trans-unit.source: There are six levels of headings. They correspond with the six levels of HTML headings. You've probably noticed them already in the page. Each level down uses one more hash character.

seg-source.mrk: There are six levels of headings.
They correspond with the six levels of HTML headings.
You've probably noticed them already in the page.
Each level down uses one more hash character.

target.mrk: There are six levels of headings.
They correspond with the six levels of HTML headings.
You've probably noticed them already in the page.
Each level down uses one more hash character.

seg-source.mrk: Headings *can* also contain **formatting**

target.mrk: Headings *can* also contain **formatting**

seg-source.mrk: They can even contain `inline code`

target.mrk: They can even contain `inline code`

trans-unit.source: Of course, demonstrating what headings look like messes up the structure of the page.

seg-source.mrk: Of course, demonstrating what headings look like messes up the structure of the page.

target.mrk: Of course, demonstrating what headings look like messes up the structure of the page.

trans-unit.source: I don't recommend using more than three or four levels of headings here, because, when you're smallest heading isn't too small, and you're largest heading isn't too big, and you want each size up to look noticeably larger and more important, there there are only so many sizes that you can use.

seg-source.mrk: I don't recommend using more than three or four levels of headings here, because, when you're smallest heading isn't too small, and you're largest heading isn't too big, and you want each size up to look noticeably larger and more important, there there are only so many sizes that you can use.

target.mrk: I don't recommend using more than three or four levels of headings here, because, when you're smallest heading isn't too small, and you're largest heading isn't too big, and you want each size up to look noticeably larger and more important, there there are only so many sizes that you can use.

seg-source.mrk: URLs

target.mrk: URLs

trans-unit.source: URLs can be made in a handful of ways:

seg-source.mrk: URLs can be made in a handful of ways:

target.mrk: URLs can be made in a handful of ways:

trans-unit.source: A named link to [MarkItDown][3]. The easiest way to do these is to select what you want to make a link and hit `Ctrl+L`.

seg-source.mrk: A named link to [MarkItDown][3].
The easiest way to do these is to select what you want to make a link and hit `Ctrl+L`.

target.mrk: A named link to [MarkItDown][3].
The easiest way to do these is to select what you want to make a link and hit `Ctrl+L`.

seg-source.mrk: Another named link to [MarkItDown](http://www.markitdown.net/)

target.mrk: Another named link to [MarkItDown](http://www.markitdown.net/)

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you just want a URL like <http://www.markitdown.net/>.

seg-source.mrk: Sometimes you just want a URL like <http://www.markitdown.net/>.

target.mrk: Sometimes you just want a URL like <http://www.markitdown.net/>.

seg-source.mrk: Horizontal rule

target.mrk: Horizontal rule

trans-unit.source: A horizontal rule is a line that goes across the middle of the page.

seg-source.mrk: A horizontal rule is a line that goes across the middle of the page.

target.mrk: A horizontal rule is a line that goes across the middle of the page.

trans-unit.source: It's sometimes handy for breaking things up.

seg-source.mrk: It's sometimes handy for breaking things up.

target.mrk: It's sometimes handy for breaking things up.

seg-source.mrk: Images

target.mrk: Images

trans-unit.source: Markdown can also contain images. I'll need to add something here sometime.

seg-source.mrk: Markdown can also contain images.
I'll need to add something here sometime.

target.mrk: Markdown can also contain images.
I'll need to add something here sometime.

seg-source.mrk: Finally

target.mrk: Finally

trans-unit.source: There's actually a lot more to Markdown than this. See the official [introduction][4] and [syntax][5] for more information. However, be aware that this is not using the official implementation, and this might work subtly differently in some of the little things.

seg-source.mrk: There's actually a lot more to Markdown than this.
See the official [introduction][4] and [syntax][5] for more information.
However, be aware that this is not using the official implementation, and this might work subtly differently in some of the little things.

target.mrk: There's actually a lot more to Markdown than this.
See the official [introduction][4] and [syntax][5] for more information.
However, be aware that this is not using the official implementation, and this might work subtly differently in some of the little things.
